Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 3
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Light Trial)

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly Basement Switch Room Pot 1

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

GC (Maze).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Gerudo Training Ground#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Lava)

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Silver Rupee Front Left

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe Silver Rupee Icicles

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Forest Trial Silver Rupee Back Center
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Fire Trial)

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Pot

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Silver Rupee Bottom Right

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Gerudo Training Ground#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Lava)

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Epona's Song#.
